attributes.comment:
I am writing to ask that the USCIS not increase their current fees for the I600A
and all of the other proposed increases that would affect those of us trying to
adopt internationally. After being told by my doctor that we could not have another
child we began to look at adoption as a viable option. It is a great deal of money
about 20,000 to adopt from China, and as two educators it is a huge strain on our
budget, but we decided to pursue it as it seemed a relilable process.
However with an ever lenghtening time-frame to adopt our daughter, we are sadded
that not only will we have to wait at least 18 more months to get her, but we will
also have to renew most of our paperwork through the USCIS during this time as it
will all expire before we travel. Please, please consider not increasing these fees
as we already will be having to pay them twice as it is.
Sincerely,
Jennifer Parker

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jennifer Parker
